column1: #text=I love to go work out at the gym .
#text=I tend to lift for a long time until I 'm spent of any excess energy .
#text=After that I 'll get on the arc trainer and start sweating a great deal .
#text=I say this to illustrate the point that after this work out I am in great need of a bath .
#text=I come home and welcome my ritual of taking a bath .
#text=I get my phone out and find my favorite Pandora station that matches my current mood .
#text=I then get the water rolling at a hot temperature .
#text=I get undressed and in the tub .
#text=I like to sit there for a while and reflect while I relax .
#text=After a few minutes I 'll lather my hair and clean it out .
#text=I might drain the tub and put in more water .
#text=Lastly I 'll soap off the nastiness of the gym .
